title: Celestial Wand
summaries: The Celestial Wand is a pet-summoning item that spawns Estee to follow the player around. When the player is far enough away, Estee will emit a beam trail while flying at high speed in order to catch up to them, which resembles that of a Fallen Star. The Celestial Wand can be purchased from the Traveling Merchant for 1 PC, and is always sold alongside the Star Princess set.

statistics.Buy: 1 PC
statistics.Sell: 20 GC
